plugin.comment: Misc settings for the motion sensor

bit.name: Show Scripted Pings At Any Distance

float32.name: Active Camo Appears As Enemy When Lower Than
float32.tooltip: active Camo users show up as enemy when active camo is lower than this value (multiplayer)

float32.name: Height Classified As Above
float32.tooltip: relative height at which something is above (meters)

float32.name: Height Classified As Below
float32.tooltip: relative height at which something is below (meters)

float32.name: Threshold Speed
float32.tooltip: speed at which stuff is visible on the sensor (meters/sec)

float32.name: Upwards Movement Scaling
float32.tooltip: multiplier for vertical speed upwards (multiplier)

float32.name: Downwards Movement Scaling
float32.tooltip: multiplier for vertical speed downwards (multiplier)

float32.name: Crouching Movement Scaling
float32.tooltip: multiplier for speed when crouching (multiplier)

float32.name: Normal Detection Range Extension
float32.tooltip: how far off the edge of the radar we can detect things (multiplier)

float32.name: Vehicle Detection Range Extension
float32.tooltip: how far off the edge of the radar we can detect vehicles (multiplier)

float32.name: Vehicle Radar Range
float32.tooltip: special range boost used for large flying vehicles (meters)

float32.name: Mech Radar Range
float32.tooltip: override for mech/mantis

float32.name: Vehicle Navigation Marker Range Detection
float32.tooltip: range at which hud nav markers will show (meters)

float32.name: Vehicle Contested Flash Time
float32.tooltip: rate at which a contested vehicle flashes (seconds)

float32.name: Active Camo X-Ray Animation Cooldown
float32.tooltip: duration to wait before showing another animation (seconds)

float32.name: Dead People Visible Time
float32.tooltip: time for which we will see dead team mates (seconds)

int32.name: Motion Tracker Fade Frames
int32.tooltip: The number of frames that a non moving target will fade out over on the motion tracker.

int32.name: Armor Mod Display Counter
int32.tooltip: The number of seconds to show the players armor mod in the HUD (seconds).

plugin.comment: Misc settings for fanfares and messages

float32.name: Fanfare Display Time
float32.tooltip: time to display the fanfares (seconds)

float32.name: Fanfare Speed Up Display Time
float32.tooltip: time to display when higher priority fanfare queues up (seconds)

float32.name: Medal Score Message Lifetime
float32.tooltip: message time of the medal score message (seconds)

float32.name: Medal Score Message Restart Time
float32.tooltip: time to reset message to when messages collide (seconds)

plugin.comment: Misc settings for the remote motion sensor

float32.name: Remote Sensor Range
float32.tooltip: absolute range. (meters)

float32.name: Remote Sensor Weak Distance
float32.tooltip: distance at which the remote sensor starts to fail (meters)

float32.name: Remote Sensor Failure Distance
float32.tooltip: distance at which the remote sensor completely fails (meters)

float32.name: Shield Bar Recent Damage Duration
float32.tooltip: time taken to drain an entire bar of visible damage. less damage drains faster (seconds)

float32.name: Damage Indicator Response Duration
float32.tooltip: duration which the damage indicator icons will show in the HUD (seconds)

float32.name: Damage Flash Response Duration
float32.tooltip: used to determine how long to show the fullscreen damage flash (seconds)

tagRef.name: Tiled Mesh Seen When Hit In 1st Person

float32.name: Number Of Tiles Across The Screen
Reticule Maximum Spread Angle
float32.tooltip: Maximum spread for all weapon reticules. This should be set to the largest spread angle of all the weapons.

plugin.comment: Settings controlling the high contrast hud rendering

float32.name: Minimum Threshold
float32.tooltip: Minimum brightness value at which the dynamic contrast activates.

float32.name: Maximum Threshold
float32.tooltip: Brightness value at which the dynamic contrast is fully activated.

float32.name: Clamp Threshold
float32.tooltip: Clamped brightness value. Can be used to limit the intensity of the dynamic contrast, or enable over strength contrast.

float32.name: Darken Factor
float32.tooltip: Opacity of the black layer.

float32.name: Brighten Factor
float32.tooltip: Overbrightness factor to apply to the additive layer.

float32.name: Medal Fanfare Animation Lifetime
float32.tooltip: animation time of the medal fanfare (seconds)

float32.name: Medal Fanfare Animation In Lifetime
float32.tooltip: animation in time of the medal fanfare (seconds)

float32.name: Medal Fanfare Animation Out Begin Time
float32.tooltip: the time to begin the animation out sequence (seconds)

float32.name: Event Fanfare Animation Lifetime
float32.tooltip: animation time of the medal fanfare (seconds)

float32.name: Event Fanfare Animation In Lifetime
float32.tooltip: animation in time of the medal fanfare (seconds)

float32.name: Event Fanfare Animation Out Begin Time
float32.tooltip: the time to begin the animation out sequence (seconds)

stringid.name: Display String
stringid.tooltip: comes out of the HUD text globals

uint16.name: Maximum Display Time
uint16.tooltip: how long the message can be on screen before being hidden

uint16.name: Display Count
uint16.tooltip: how many times a training message will get displayed (0-3 only

uint16.name: Dissapear Delay
uint16.tooltip: how long a displayed but untriggered message stays up

uint16.name: Redisplay Delay
uint16.tooltip: how long after display this message will stay hidden

float32.name: Display Delay
float32.tooltip: how long the event can be triggered before it's displayed
